t: Brand Registry Roles | Amazon & Marketplace SOPs
s: Each individual must create a Brand Registry user account and accept the Brand Registry terms before any roles can be assigned to that user account. If a user already has a Seller or Vendor account with Amazon, they can create a Brand Registry user account with the same credentials.
